item.title: CVE-2024-27970|2024-03-21T15:25:20.253Z -- BogdanFix -- WP SendFox
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in BogdanFix WP SendFox.This issue affects WP SendFox: from n/a through 1.3.0.
